title: Resource Manager不健康
description: 当不健康的Resource Manager百分比超过设定的阈值时发送警报

clauses.expr:
100 - 
(
  sum(service_role_healthy{roleType="YARN_RESOURCEMANAGER"}  and service_role_present) by (serviceId, serviceName) / on(serviceId, serviceName) (service_role_number{roleType="YARN_RESOURCEMANAGER"} )
    + on(serviceId) group_left() 
  (1-service_monitored)
) * 100

descriptionTemplate: 服务 {{ $labels.serviceName }} 中不健康的Resource Manager的百分比达到 {{ printf "%.2f"  $value }}%
